activities: McLarens only collects personal information, on an as needed basis, it is done so with the limited purpose of adjusting the insurance claim as appointed by the carrier(s).  Such information is not shared outside of McLarens unless such provision is required by applicable laws and regulations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Please refer to the "Information Collection" section of our Privacy Policy.
privacyprograms: McLarens is registered with the Information Commissioner’s Office based in the United Kingdom.  Our Registration Number is Z1540031.
recoursemech: McLarens has chosen JAMS to be its independent recourse mechanism and they are available to review and/or investigate any concerns should the need arise.
